desc_start_node: Workflow start node. Click to configure global variables, triggers, and more.
desc_add_trigger: After adding a trigger, the workflow can be triggered by scheduled tasks or external events.
tip_global_variable_definition:
Define global variables for the workflow. Global variables can temporarily cache data. They can be assigned in the following ways:
1. When accessed via webapp, parameters can be concatenated in the URL to assign values to global variables
2. When accessed via API, parameter values can be passed in the API
3. Global variables can be assigned via variable assignment nodes
msg_variable_linked_to_trigger: This variable is linked to a trigger, please unlink it first
